name: Micro Wave Fighter X
description:
Micro Wave Fighter X:

A Game About Fighting With Waves.

Jump and double jump to create massive waves of stuff and hit the other player to knock them out of the level.

What the critics are saying:

  • "Best game made in 48 hours by a team of 5 people in a place in Toronto. One of them likes the word moist."

NOTAKU

  • "10/10 would screen-shake again."

YGN

  • "A beautiful story about friendship and splashing substances."

GAMESPOCK

A game made for GGJ by:

  • Mathew Leo Methot
  • Attila Imecs
  • Olivier Perrault (FoodFish)
  • Gabriel Duarte (@GabeD3D)
  • Scott Duff
